About Me

With a passion for learning and solving problems, I have developed skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Responsive Web Design through the Udacity Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree. With these skills I am shifting my career towards web development. My past experience has proven my ability to collaborate and coordinate projects between co-workers, clients and vendors.

Hobbies:When I am not working on web stuff, I split my time between running, brewing beer, roasting coffee, and growing vegetables and herbs in an aquaponics system.
